function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Vulnerability of populations with poor air quality to pandemics","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and transmission","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impacted medical practice","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possibility of vertical transmission of sars-cov-2 from mother to child","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of included studies from specific geographic areas","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral shedding in feces and other body fluids despite resolution of symptoms","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of transmission through sharing of coughing, and sneezing.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus transmission through contaminated surfaces fomites and the viability of the virus in gastrointestinal tract.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible modes of transmission of sars-cov-2 including airborne transmission via results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underestimation of modes of transmission","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of cross-contamination from stainless steel surfaces due to inadequate cleaning procedures and disinfectant application.","category":"Failure to implement preventive
